desc: January 15, 1987, Dr. Farid Zarif Naturopathic and Nutrition Specialist, discovered the 1st, 3rd, 5th, 7th, 10th, and 12th hours are the most effective times to eat for optimal health in grown-ups and children, and the three most important steps to better health are nutrition, exercise and sleep.
